description: PDMOD files are created and shared by gamers to change gameplay, such as character appearances, environments, and sound effects. You can create and install PDMOD files using PAYDAY Bundle Modder.

Any PDMOD files you install in Payday will be replaced by game updates from Steam. If you want to retain your PDMOD files through these updates, you need to uninstall the PDMOD files, update the game, then reinstall the PDMOD files.

NOTE: You can also protect your mods from updates with the "mod_overrides" folder which requires you to extract your PDMOD files and place them in a "mode_overrides" folder in the "assets" folder of Payday. The PDMOD files require a password to be extracted is: "0$45'5))66S2ixF51a<6}L2UK".
